description: Numbers n such that number of runs in the base 4 representation of n is congruent to 8 mod 10.
comments: Superset of A043599. Differs from A043866 because there are numbers with 17 or 18 runs, for example. Differs from A043850 because there are numbers with 16 or 18 runs, for example. [From _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 20 2008]
author: _Clark Kimberling_
